name: Save Yourself! (free demo)
description:
A Retro shooter that I've been working on! Inspired by Quake, Wolfenstein, and games of that style. This is a demo and is currently a work in progress. I'll be updating it here soon with more levels, a new weapon, sensitivity settings, and more features! In addition, I'm hoping to add at least a local multiplayer component in the future!

For now, let me know what you think! 

Disclaimers: Level 4 is currently an unedited level, and is simply the same as level 1, as that is my template for the rest of the levels. This is still a demo so some features may not work as expected.

Special Thanks to "Sample Text" for creating the asset I used for this project as my framework!
